h1.strong: Welcome to the Top-Performing Cyber School in PA

div.class: grid__item two-twelfths palm-one-half hard relative valign--bottom
grid__item one-half palm-one-whole hard--ends all--btn all--btn--purple
div.h2: PA Virtual Helps Students Reach Their Potential

span.p: PA Virtual is an award-winning and innovative online school that provides K-12 home-based, public education (tuition-free) to students across Pennsylvania. We want your child to achieve his or her personal best, that’s why we partner with our families to provide customized learning for every student.
Our teachers focus on individual students and an interactive learning experience. Find out if we’re right for your child.

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: PA Virtual delivers instruction via synchronous and asynchronous classes. Students can attend live classes (synchronous) or work in a self-directed environment supervised by a dedicated teacher (asynchronous).

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: Students attend class from the comfort and convenience of their own home, at no cost to the parent.

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: Our students have the support and guidance of certified teachers and principals as well as their parent/Learning Coach at home.

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: PA Virtual partners with K12, Inc. to deliver a rich and stimulating curriculum for all grade levels.

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: PA Virtual hosts numerous field trips each month across Pennsylvania, in addition to offering various student clubs and service learning opportunities.

div.class: advantage--block grid__item one-third tablet-one-half palm-one-whole short hard--sides padding--short background--white
advantage--block--inner grid__item one-whole short hard--sides padding--tall

div.p: Our school offers comprehensive services for your family including: Guidance Counselors, Family Support Coordinators, Pupil Health, and Parent Engagement services.

span.p:
Click the button to receive informative
emails and videos.

span.span: experience for my daughter and me.

span.p: Being able to have one-on-one experiences with the teachers and staff is a remarkable feeling. My daughter has grown tremendously in her academics at PA Virtual. Picking this school has been the best decision in our life.”
